name: Bierhause
description:
Bierhause is a point & click action game with an objective of hosting customers in a tavern. Customers inform their orders and the player tries to meet them with haste. Core loop revolves around checking for orders and serving ale before customers grow restless.

Controls:

mouse right: walk to the spot

mouse left: action

Click barrel on the bar to fill inventory and serve by clicking hovering icons over the tables.  Player must be next to the table in order to serve.
